last_episode_to_air.name: Boyfriend
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the boys and girls schools meet for a Sports Day, Charlie's on the brink of breaking it all off with Nick while Elle and Tao share a special moment.

name: Heartstopper
overview: Teens Charlie and Nick discover their unlikely friendship might be something more as they navigate school and young love in this coming-of-age series.

seasons.name: Season 1

tagline: The beginning of one thing can be the rest of everything.
